title: Easy farming
description: Online advice system for agriculture that allows the user to enter information about their crops and receive notifications for their management.

title: Millionare Quiz App
description: The Millionaire Quiz App is an interactive quiz application that offers users an engaging and challenging experience.

title: Weather App
description: By searching a city, you get de max and min temperature, wind, humidity and current temperature.

title: Delicious- Food Blog
description: A website that offers access to a variety of recipes. By logging in, users can save their favourite recipes, manage their shopping lists and their fridges. It is also possible to create and edit new recipes.

title: Readly- eStore
description: A website where you can buy books (with checkout and package tracking).
